description.value:
Worn directly over the face, not over a helmet or goggles. Wearer must have Psyker trait. Grants +20 to all Charm, Deceive, and Intimidate Tests. As Half Action wearer can make -10 Willpower Test to gain Fear(1) for WP Bonus Minutes, +1 per Degree of Success after first. Mask hides face.

Requirements

A Mask that changes to give meaning to gestures and body language. Strange but not innately heretical

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
